hero_subtitle: Enthusiast in developing innovative solutions with technology, design, and impact!
about_description: I'm a 20-year-old Full Stack Developer, proudly born in Recife, the capital of Pernambuco, located in Northeast Brazil. With a degree in Internet Systems from the Catholic University of Pernambuco (UNICAP), I currently work as a Software Engineer in Artificial Intelligence. Additionally, I have my own Technology and Design brand. I have practical experience in academic, personal, and freelance projects carried out through my agency, as well as professional experience in developing AI solutions.
about_passion: I'm passionate about creating complete solutions, combining backend logic with intuitive frontend interfaces. My interest in Artificial Intelligence drives me to develop intelligent applications that enhance digital products. Enjoy continuous learning, tackling technical challenges, and applying software engineering best practices to deliver efficient, scalable, and impactful systems.
about_mission: My goal is to continue growing as a Full Stack Developer, contributing to innovative teams to create high-quality digital products that combine cutting-edge technology, artificial intelligence, and real value for users and businesses.
projects_subtitle: Projects I've developed or contributed to
project_ggabs_description: Landing Page for my freelance technology and design agency: GGABS Tech & Design.
project_ref_description: REF is a modern and intuitive ABNT reference generator. Created to simplify the lives of students, teachers, and researchers in creating accurate and standardized bibliographic references.
project_semprenicea_description: Sempre Nicea is a digital platform developed to centralize, organize, and disseminate academic research on the Council of Nicaea (AD 325), promoting access to reliable content and encouraging collaboration among researchers from various countries.
project_portfolio_v1_description: My Portfolio (first version) is a digital showcase highlighting my journey as a Full Stack developer in training. With a minimalist design and subtle, yet original animations, the portfolio is fully translated into Portuguese and English, providing a visual and functional experience to explore my projects and skills.
project_portfolio_v2_description: This new version of my portfolio represents a complete rebranding, marking my evolution as a Full Stack Developer. It combines a minimalist and professional design with original animations that maintain my visual identity.
project_real_description: REAL - Budget Simulator is a digital solution that automates the creation of personalized quotes, making the process faster, clearer, and more professional. With WhatsApp integration, it allows businesses to generate instant quotes for their customers, optimizing time, capturing leads, and increasing conversions. Easy to integrate with Instagram or a website, REAL transforms the quoting experience into something agile and efficient.
project_marvel_description: Marvel Character Visualization: A website that uses the Marvel Comics Public API to display Marvel characters. Users can view a complete list of all characters and search for a specific one, providing an easy and interactive way to explore the Marvel Universe.
project_recdaterra_description: RecDaterra is a digital platform created as a university project at the Catholic University of Pernambuco. It connects small businesses in Recife with the community, promoting local products and services and allowing direct interaction between consumers and suppliers. Explore the area and support a sustainable and vibrant community.
project_dashboard_inep_description: Educational Management Dashboard 2022: A data management and visualization system based on INEP microdata. It offers a unified and intuitive view of basic education in Brazil, allowing clear and effective monitoring of school and student situations to promote efficient educational management.
project_caremind_edu_description: Caremind Edu is an application focused on the physical and mental well-being of educators, offering simple daily self-care activities that generate points. These points unlock informative articles for professional and personal optimization. Additionally, there is an area for scheduling sessions with specialized psychologists, allowing teachers to share their difficulties.
exp_ggabs_desc: Founder and responsible for all operations at GGABS Tech & Design, leading Full Stack development of websites and systems, intuitive UI/UX design, branding and visual identity, digital marketing strategies, project management, client support, and creating impactful visual experiences. I manage scalability, performance, and continuous process and digital presence optimization.
exp_aicury_desc: Software Engineer at Aicury, focused on Artificial Intelligence solutions for system validation, security, and improvement. I build robust solutions, applying software engineering best practices and continuous monitoring to ensure performance and reliability.
exp_tpf_desc: Low Code Developer at TPF Engenharia, participating in the Porto Digital Grow Up Software Residency program. I developed a simple ERP system for sustainability reports using the Madrix platform, focusing on ESG process automation and data control. I applied agile methodologies (Scrum), presented the project to stakeholders with a detailed pitch, participated in alignments, and collaborated in a multidisciplinary team to create scalable solutions aligned with the company's needs.
exp_cesar_desc: QA Tester at CESAR, participating in the Porto Digital Rise Up Software Residency program. I developed skills in software testing and quality assurance, creating and executing test cases, identifying and reporting bugs, and producing clear documentation. I collaborated in a multidisciplinary team, led projects, managed time, and applied QA best practices to deliver reliable and efficient solutions.
experience_no_experience: No experience found in this category.
exp_unicap_desc: Degree in Internet Systems from the Catholic University of Pernambuco (UNICAP), with a focus on research and development of distributed systems and microservices architecture. I developed skills in scalability, fault tolerance, and the application of modern technologies, preparing me for challenges in software engineering.
exp_cmr_desc: High School education at Recife Military School (CMR). This solid foundation in logic, organization, discipline, and commitment prepared me for an academic and professional career in technology.
certificates_subtitle: My continuous learning journey, including bootcamps, specialized courses, and participation in technical events
cert_magalu_title: Frontend in the Cloud Era - Performance, Scalability, and Digital Experience
cert_magalu_desc: An event organized by the Recife Frontend Community in partnership with Magalu Cloud, focusing on frontend trends, including performance, scalability, and enhancing digital experiences in the cloud.
cert_wadhwani_desc: A program focused on developing essential skills for the job market, enhancing employability.
cert_java_desc: An intensive bootcamp focused on backend development using Java, Spring Boot, and microservices architectures.
cert_python_desc: An introductory course to the Python programming language, covering the fundamentals of programming and its main applications.
cert_git_title: Git and GitHub, Sharing and Collaborating on Projects
cert_git_desc: A comprehensive course on version control with Git and collaboration on projects using GitHub.
cert_mongodb_desc: Learn the fundamentals and practical applications of MongoDB, a flexible and scalable NoSQL database.
cert_globo_desc: Participation in a Globo hackathon, developing innovative solutions in a collaborative and challenging environment.
cert_easy_desc: Completion of the Advanced II cycle of the CLASSIC English course at the institution.
ggabs_description: GGABS Tech & Design is an independent agency specializing in tailored digital solutions. We operate at the intersection of technology and design to create unique, functional, and visually impactful experiences.
ggabs_mission: With a clear vision of turning ideas into reality, I created GGABS to deliver digital solutions that empower businesses and fulfill dreams. We believe that every business, regardless of size, deserves access to quality design and innovative technological solutions.
ggabs_services: Through GGABS, I aim to offer personalized and accessible solutions, helping companies transform their ideas into reality and reach their full potential.
contact_subtitle: For opportunities, collaborations, or technical discussions
contact_description: I'm always open to new connections and discussing challenges in the tech field. Whether for career opportunities, project collaborations, or simply to exchange ideas about the latest trends, feel free to reach out.
